channel.title: CVE Feed for zeroturnaround -- zt-zip
channel.description: The latest CVEs for zeroturnaround -- zt-zip

item.title: CVE-2018-1002201|2024-08-05T12:47:57.595Z -- zeroturnaround -- zt-zip
item.description: zt-zip before 1.13 is vulnerable to directory traversal, allowing attackers to write to arbitrary files via a ../ (dot dot slash) in a Zip archive entry that is mishandled during extraction. This vulnerability is also known as 'Zip-Slip'.
